name: 8-6-4-2 Wave Loading
overview_and_execution: Perform 8 reps at a moderate load, rest 2-3 min, 6 reps heavier, rest, 4 reps heavier, rest, final 2 reps the heaviest. Optionally do multiple waves if advanced (e.g. 2 waves of 8-6-4-2).
example_application: Bench: 8×185, 6×205, 4×225, 2×245. Next session attempt small load increases if successful.
important_notes: Good for bridging hypertrophy & strength. Manage rest well. Over multiple sessions, wave up the loads steadily.
